sentences:
Sentence 0:
The optimally expressed recombinant fusion protein, Hespintor-Kazal, with a molecular weight of 42 kDa was obtained by 0.25 mmol/l isopropyl beta-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) induction at 30 C for 5 h .
sentence_raw: The optimally expressed recombinant fusion protein, Hespintor-Kazal, with a molecular weight of 42 kDa was obtained by 0.25 mmol/l isopropyl beta-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) induction at 30 C for 5 h .
